name: Bebop Band 1
description: With the Bebop Band 1 app, children can explore and have fun learning the English language through music  and parents can sing along too!   Ideal for young learners, the Bebop Band 1 app will help to boost your childs English vocabulary and test their memory through:    8 animated musical stories linked to daily routines  73 video flashcards  all including American Sign Language translations  8 action song videos to sing and dance along to  32 engaging interactive games.   The app provides a great way for children to build and practice their language skills at home, and may also be recommended by teachers for use alongside level 1 of Macmillan Educations Bebop course for pre-school.
